H0.text: A long piece of copper wire will always produce a magnetic force on a nearby iron nail.

H1.text: A large static electric charge always produces a magnetic force on a nearby iron nail.

H2.text: An electric current will always produce a magnetic force on a nearby iron nail.

H3.text: An electric field always produces a magnetic force on a nearby iron nail.

A5.text: When the current is switched off, the coil loses its magnetism immediately.
